course.subject: RMBI
course.name: Design of Business Intelligence Solutions
course.description: This course develops students' understanding of the design principles and best practices when designing, implementing, and deploying a business intelligence technical architecture. This course introduces the basic BI solution design concepts and components covering the major concepts, techniques and skills of solution design and implementation and the stages of the lifecycle. It focuses on the components of BI technical architecture, foundational methods of solution design modeling and the project-specific lifecycle for capturing requirements and deriving solution technical architecture.
